title: Habib Khoury
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415103021/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Designers](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415103021/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Designers) : Habib Khoury**

'Habib Khoury' is an [Israeli](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415103021/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Israel) typographer and typeface designer, the principal of [AvanType](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415103021/http:/typophile.com/wiki/AvanType) foundry.

URL: [http://avantype.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415103021/http:/avantype.com/ "http://avantype.com/")
author: hrant
